display_title.display_title:
Burundi - Highway Maintenance
            Project : Burundi - Projet d'Entretien Routier

subtopic: Business Environment,Business in Development,Urban Transport,Roads & Highways

abstracts.cdata!:
The Highway Maintenance Project for
            Burundi consists of implementation of a four-year highway
            maintenance program; pre-investment studies for improvement
            of the Ngozi-Muyinga-Kobero road; preparation of a master
            plan for further road development and additional feasibility
            studies; refinancing of Credit S11-BU.
